special_powers.description: Sif can use Invulnerability. When Sif is adajcent to a friendly character named Thor, he can use Shape Change, but only succeeds on a result of 6.
Heimdall can use Perplex and Probability Control as if he had a range value of 8. When he does, he can use Improved Targeting: Hindering, Characters.

Give Thor a ranged combat action and he can use Improved Targeting: Characters for this action. The area of effect for this ranged attack is any one square within range and line of fire and each square adjacent to it. A hit character occupying the chosen square is dealt Thor's printed damage value. Other hit characters are dealt Thor's printed damage -1.

Thor can use Charge. He can use it normally, or when he is given an action to use Charge, if he moves in a direct line, he can use Improved Movement: Characters and, after actions resolve, each character occupying a square that Thor moved through is dealt 1 damage, assigned an action token, and you may place it in a square adjacent to their current position.

special_powers.name: Interdimensional Portal
special_powers.description: Orange squares are Portal squares. Portal squares are hindering terrain. For other exciting scenarioes, check the scenario sheet included in this starter!
